snippet.title: The Civil War (1861-1865) Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing Grand Tactician: The Civil War (1861-1865)!

Grand Tactician: The Civil War (1861-1865) is a real time strategy game, where you will run your nation, muster, manage and support great armies, and maneuver them to defeat the enemy. Once the opposing armies meet, command your troops to victory in battles fought on historical battlefields.

The game is in development, and release date will be announced later. Everything seen in this video is pre-alpha state, and subject to changes during development.

Also check out our partner LionHeart Filmworks' YouTube Channel, for amazing re-enactment and combat footage of the American Civil War and more!
https://www.youtube.com/user/Lionheart1864
